Value: Provide chargeback or showback for internal and external services taking into account service Subscription and Usage information. •  Break down chargeback or showback based on charge types such as CapEx/OpEx, direct/indirect, fixed/variable, and labor/non-labor, as well as by consumer or consumer groups. •  Charge for IT services rendered based on the pricing model associated with the catalog item, this may also be implemented via showback (no actual billing or cross-charging), which helps the consumer become more IT cost-aware. •  Trace chargeback or showback line items to individual cost drivers based on the cost model. •  Consolidate IT service Subscription (right to use) and actual Usage as the usage may differ from the right to use.
